text: Richard Jeranian () 17 July 1921 – 10 October 2019) was an Armenian painter, draftsman and lithographer active in France.(fr)Art actif His works were figurative, surrealist, cubist or abstract periods covering the themes of music, woman and Armenia through figures, landscapes, genre scenes or still lifes in oil and ink. Jeranian died on 10 October 2019 at the age of 98.French-Armenian artist Richard Jéranian dies aged 98 ==References== ==Other websites== * Richard Jeranian on Stephanies Gallery * Richard Jeranian on Artnet * Richard Jeranian Website Category:1921 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Armenian painters Category:20th-century Armenian people
title: Richard Jeranian
